attributes.action: Scrap EMA and allow students access to job seekers allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported that Education Maintenance Allowance may be scrapped due to disproportionate administrative costs.  Since Job Seekers Allowance exists and will continue scrapping EMA and opening up JSA to students will leverage economies of scale and allow students to get more at no extra cost to the public purse.
